conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Good evening. My name is Fabio. I'll be your waiter for tonight. May I take your order?

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: No, I'm still working on it. This menu isn't even in English. What's good here?

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: For you sir, I would recommend  spaghetti and meatballs.

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: Does it come with coke and fries?

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: It comes with either soup or salad and a complimentary glass of wine, sir.

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: I'll go with the spaghetti and meatballs, salad and the wine.

conversation.speaker: A
conversation.text: Excellent choice. Your order will be ready soon.

conversation.speaker: B
conversation.text: You know what? I'll just go grab a burger across the street.

keyVocabulary.definition: Not yet completed, need more time

supplementaryVocabulary.definition: Female server at a restaurant or bar
